Title: Establishes procedures regarding orders of post-termination visitation and/or contact between a child and such child's parent
Summary: Establishes procedures regarding orders of post-termination visitation and/or contact between a child and such child's parent and for modification of such orders.
LawCode: Amd ยง634, Fam Ct Act; amd ยง384-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the social services law, in relation to establishing procedures regarding orders of post-termination visitation and/or contact between a child and such child's parent
